issue.title: [CF 64] more debuff conditions
issue.body:
What is the enhancement in mind? How should it look and feel?

Please provide any additional information below.

Hello, I do not know if this is possible, but could you add conditions for say if a curse/poison/magic effect/disease are on you? as a ret paladin to see cleanse pop up when needed would be really great. Also show on buff timer x (inquisition 6 seconds, display) things like that. One last one, possible to overlay a character onto the icon, for example "1" to represent to the player, "I should press 1 to do that"


> Posted by CurseForge user stonechitlin | Imported from CurseForge issue #64 | Raw
